code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white male aged 39 yrs presents with mild denial of any nausea, vomit, or diarrhea for 2 weeks. patient also reports mild vague abdominal discomfort, mild anorexia, Cancer. denies any alcohol use he has a history of smoking o:Height 170 cm, Weight 93.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ELOXATIN - 50 MG/10 ML IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CBC, FOBT.
